description:
In this final week, join the patrons one last time as Akemi reaches new heights of ridiculousness involving inappropriate words. So pick up a glass and enjoy the run-down snack bar as you de-stress, engage, and sing along!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Risen` To The Top (男ならば欲するもの) / Try A Little Tenderness (やさしいきもちで) / Just One Look (心からの贈り物)
Risen` to the Top (If You`re a Man, You Desire) / Try a Little Tenderness (With Kindness) / Just One Look (A Gift from the Heart)
Risen` to the Top (Otoko Naraba Hossuru Mono) / Try a Little Tenderness (Yasashii Kimochi de) / Just One Look (Kokoro kara no Okurimono)
